content: I'm dealing with a FHIR implementation who's converting from V2 to FHIR. The output is a transaction Bundle that has one entry element which is an array of resources and requests, rather than one resource per entry. I've never seen that before so I thought I'd check if that is considered kosher. Is it?
Resource is 0..1 in entry, so, it doesn't sound kosher -- actually barely even deli-style.
I thought not. Yet another issue I have to raise with these people.
